body_html: I'm curious why nobody tagged me here? I just looked at cpp_extensions.py and it's suddenly 2x the size of when I wrote it. It's great that Windows works now, but I think if a function (_write_ninja_file) is 120 lines long, we're doing something wrong. It will be harder to maintain this way

body: I'm curious why nobody tagged me here? I just looked at `cpp_extensions.py` and it's suddenly 2x the size of when I wrote it. It's great that Windows works now, but I think if a function (`_write_ninja_file`) is 120 lines long, we're doing something wrong. It will be harder to maintain this way
